div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImmunizationRecommendation|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `ImmunizationRecommendation` is representable via FHIR R4B Resource `ImmunizationRecommendation`. Element `ImmunizationRecommendation` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.meta`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.implicitRules`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.language` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.language`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.text`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.contained`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.identifier`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.patient` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.patient`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.date` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.date`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.date` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.date`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.authority` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.authority`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.authority` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.protocol.authority`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation`.

Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation`. Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.protocol`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.vaccineCode` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.vaccineCode`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.targetDisease` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.targetDisease`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.targetDisease` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 structure `ImmunizationRecommendation`, but has no target element specified.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.contraindicatedVaccineCode` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.contraindicatedVaccineCode`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.contraindicatedVaccineCode` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `ImmunizationRecommendation`, but has no target element specified.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.forecastStatus` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.forecastStatus`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.forecastReason` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.forecastReason`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.forecastReason` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `ImmunizationRecommendation`, but has no target element specified.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.dateCriterion` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.dateCriterion`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.dateCriterion.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.dateCriterion.code`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.dateCriterion.value` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.dateCriterion.value`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.description` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.description`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.description` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.protocol.description`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.series` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.series`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.series` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.protocol.series`.

Note that the target element context `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.doseNumber[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation`. Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.doseNumber` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.doseNumber[x]`. Note that the target element context `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.doseNumber[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.doseNumber` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.doseNumber`.

Note that the target element context `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.seriesDoses[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation`. Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.seriesDoses` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.seriesDoses[x]`. Note that the target element context `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.seriesDoses[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.seriesDoses` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.supportingImmunization` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.supportingImmunization`.
Element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.supportingPatientInformation` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `ImmunizationRecommendation.recommendation.supportingPatientInformation`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
